text: Hamlet () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev.Киностудия "Ленфильм" открывает культурно-выставочный центрГамлет (1964) It stars Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Mikhail Nazvanov, and Elza Radziņa. ==Actors== * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Prince Hamlet * Mikhail Nazvanov as Claudius * Elza Radziņa as Gertrude * Yuri Tolubeyev as Polonius == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1964 drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies set in castles
title: Hamlet (1964 movie)
